controls.title: Account Management
controls.description: Manage information system accounts, group memberships, privileges, workflow, notifications, deactivations, and authorizations

implementation.description: Configure IAM roles and policies for Neptune access with least privilege principles using CloudFormation or Terraform

controls.title: Access Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorizations for logical access to information and system resources

implementation.description: Implement IAM policies and resource-based policies to control access to Neptune clusters and databases

controls.title: Transmission Confidentiality and Integrity
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality and integrity of transmitted information

implementation.description: Enable SSL/TLS encryption for all Neptune connections and configure security groups to allow only encrypted traffic

controls.title: Protection of Information at Rest
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality and integrity of information at rest

implementation.description: Enable encryption at rest for Neptune clusters using AWS KMS keys in CloudFormation templates

controls.title: Audit Generation
controls.description: Provide audit record generation capability for defined auditable events

implementation.description: Configure Neptune audit logging and integrate with CloudTrail for comprehensive audit trail

controls.title: Boundary Protection
controls.description: Monitor and control communications at the external boundary and key internal boundaries

implementation.description: Deploy Neptune in private subnets with proper VPC configuration and security group rules

controls.title: Baseline Configuration
controls.description: Develop, document, and maintain a current baseline configuration

implementation.description: Use Infrastructure as Code to maintain consistent Neptune cluster configurations and parameter groups

controls.title: Information System Monitoring
controls.description: Monitor the information system to detect attacks and indicators of potential attacks

implementation.description: Configure CloudWatch monitoring and alarms for Neptune performance metrics and security events

controls.title: Neptune DB clusters should be encrypted
controls.description: Neptune DB clusters should have encryption enabled to protect data at rest

implementation.description: Set StorageEncrypted parameter to true and specify KmsKeyId in Neptune cluster configuration

controls.title: Neptune DB clusters should publish audit logs to CloudWatch Logs
controls.description: Neptune clusters should be configured to export audit logs to CloudWatch

implementation.description: Configure EnableCloudwatchLogsExports parameter with audit log types in cluster template

controls.title: Neptune DB cluster snapshots should be encrypted
controls.description: Neptune cluster snapshots should be encrypted to protect backup data

implementation.description: Ensure KmsKeyId is specified when creating manual snapshots and verify automatic snapshots inherit encryption

controls.title: Neptune DB clusters should have deletion protection enabled
controls.description: Enable deletion protection to prevent accidental cluster deletion

implementation.description: Set DeletionProtection parameter to true in Neptune cluster configuration

controls.title: Neptune DB clusters should have automated backups enabled
controls.description: Ensure automated backups are enabled with appropriate retention period

implementation.description: Configure BackupRetentionPeriod with minimum 7 days and set PreferredBackupWindow

controls.title: Identity and Access Management
controls.description: Implement strong identity verification and access management controls

implementation.description: Configure multi-factor authentication for IAM users accessing Neptune and implement role-based access control

controls.title: Encryption Key Management
controls.description: Implement proper encryption key management and rotation policies

implementation.description: Use AWS KMS with customer-managed keys for Neptune encryption and implement automatic key rotation

controls.title: Data Security and Information Lifecycle Management
controls.description: Implement data classification and protection throughout its lifecycle

implementation.description: Classify Neptune data based on sensitivity and implement appropriate access controls and data retention policies

controls.title: Infrastructure and Virtualization Security
controls.description: Secure the underlying infrastructure and virtualization layers

implementation.description: Deploy Neptune in isolated VPC with private subnets and implement network segmentation

controls.title: Security Threat Assessment
controls.description: Continuously assess and monitor for security threats

implementation.description: Enable AWS GuardDuty and Security Hub to monitor Neptune-related security events and threats

controls.title: Neptune clusters should be encrypted
controls.description: This control checks whether Neptune clusters are encrypted

implementation.description: Enable encryption by setting StorageEncrypted to true in Neptune cluster resource definition

controls.title: Neptune clusters should have audit logging enabled
controls.description: This control checks whether Neptune clusters have audit logging enabled

implementation.description: Configure EnableCloudwatchLogsExports parameter to include audit logs in cluster template

controls.title: Neptune clusters should be deployed across multiple Availability Zones
controls.description: This control checks whether Neptune clusters are configured for high availability

implementation.description: Configure DB subnet group to span multiple AZs and deploy read replicas across different AZs

controls.title: Neptune cluster snapshots should not be public
controls.description: This control checks whether Neptune cluster snapshots are publicly accessible

implementation.description: Ensure manual snapshots are not shared publicly and implement IAM policies to prevent public sharing

controls.title: Neptune clusters should have automatic minor version upgrade enabled
controls.description: This control checks whether automatic minor version upgrades are enabled

implementation.description: Set AutoMinorVersionUpgrade parameter to true in Neptune cluster configuration

controls.title: Right-size Neptune instances
controls.description: Monitor and adjust Neptune instance types based on actual workload requirements

implementation.description: Use CloudWatch metrics to monitor CPU, memory, and storage utilization and resize instances accordingly

controls.title: Optimize backup retention periods
controls.description: Set appropriate backup retention periods to balance data protection and storage costs

implementation.description: Configure BackupRetentionPeriod based on business requirements, typically 7-35 days

controls.title: Use read replicas efficiently
controls.description: Deploy read replicas only when needed and monitor their utilization

implementation.description: Monitor read replica utilization and remove underutilized replicas or scale down instance types

controls.title: Implement automated start/stop for development environments
controls.description: Automatically stop Neptune clusters during non-business hours for development and testing

implementation.description: Use Lambda functions with CloudWatch Events to automatically start/stop Neptune clusters on schedule

controls.title: Monitor and optimize data transfer costs
controls.description: Minimize cross-AZ and cross-region data transfer charges

implementation.description: Deploy applications in same AZ as Neptune primary instance and use VPC endpoints to reduce data transfer

controls.title: Clean up unused snapshots
controls.description: Regularly review and delete unnecessary manual snapshots

implementation.description: Implement automated snapshot lifecycle management to delete old snapshots based on retention policies

controls.title: Use appropriate instance families
controls.description: Select cost-effective instance families based on workload characteristics

implementation.description: Choose T3 instances for variable workloads, R5 for memory-intensive, or customize based on performance requirements

controls.title: Implement resource tagging for cost allocation
controls.description: Tag Neptune resources for accurate cost tracking and allocation

implementation.description: Apply consistent tagging strategy including cost center, environment, and project tags to all Neptune resources
